author: Steve Meder
comment: I have a moto 360 sport and this watch face keeps the heart rate monitor constantly running, which I can tell by the blinking green lights. Odd though, that this face doesn't track heart rate. As soon as I revoke senor permissions for aviator on my watch, the heart rate monitor turns off.  Please fix.
title: Sensor activation issues

author: Deeply Young
comment: Loving it.... Will use it for daily drivers.. Thanks for the lovely face...
title: Superb awesome looks

author: Jan Nagy
comment: Does not work on lg urbane
